files.text:
Task: Print the last letter from the "Input" string below. It can be a letter or a number.

-------------------------------
Input: {{ input }}
-------------------------------

Do this task yourself. Put only the output character between <ans> and </ans> tags. Start your response with the answer first and only then explain if needed. Use the phrase "THE_END" to mark the end of the response.
files.name: task_nocot

files.text: You are a very careful and precise assistant. You always follow the instructions and solve tasks yourself. You never generate code.
